article_title: Free tax help is plentiful this season

article_metadata.author: Daniel Tyson REGISTER-HERALD REPORTER

og.description: A wise editor once told a young reporter covering taxation that if anyone says they understand everything in the federal tax code never quote them, because they are lying.
